1568918753_1ATbMGy3hSpTHeHfkmX6kNRn2kbRT.body:
> [aspidochelone](#comment_196_1PPUrYcZ1E1rGkkE6PH18Qi43LRsKABo1Z): Concept: this reality is one of a large series of Days of Creation, parallel universes in which there "are"/"were" parallel versions of ourselves.  Causality violations in our universe lead to multiple potential solutions, of which conscious beings select one based on the perpendicular time with these other universes.  Question: in dreams, in fantasy, in recollection, can people access their parallel universe memories, including in some cases technologies and philosophies not presently known in this universe?  Do there exist transdimensional organizations, of which some of ourselves may already be associated, which can infiltrate and project to this universe? [...]

I clicked on this thread whilst high and was not prepared for this. I hope I check this out sober too, seems kinda mindblowing.
